name: Buzz!: The Music Quiz
description:
It's the ultimate game show - live in your living room!
Test your music knowledge and buzzer skills in the most frantic game show ever
Meet Buzz, the show's super-smooth, wise-cracking host
Create a set of questions and host your very own game show in Quiz Master Mode
Featuring more than 1,000 song clips and over 5,000 questions spanning six decades of music!
